mapper.select: SELECT coalesce(pjfile.fileName, 'noimg') as deal01, pjdeal.* FROM pjdeal JOIN pjfile ON pjdeal.dealIdx = pjfile.fileTableIdx AND pjfile.fileTableType = 2 AND pjfile.fileOrder = 0 ORDER BY pjdeal.dealRegDate DESC

SELECT d.*, COALESCE(f.fileName, 'noimg') as deal01, COALESCE(d.dealview, 1) as dealview FROM pjdeal d LEFT JOIN pjfile f ON d.dealIdx = f.fileTableIdx AND f.fileTableType = 2 AND f.fileOrder = 0 WHERE d.dealIdx = #{dealIdx}
SELECT * FROM pjfile WHERE fileTableIdx = #{dealIdx} AND fileTableType = 2 ORDER BY fileOrder ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pjdealfavorite WHERE dealIdx = #{dealIdx}
SELECT COALESCE( ROUND(AVG(dealSatisSellerScore), 1), '5.0' ) as avgScore FROM pjdealsatisfaction WHERE dealSatisSellerIdx = #{userIdx}
